source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name], a.[ShortName], a.[AddressLine1],a.[AddressLine2], a.[AddressLine3],a.[Locality],a.[PostCode],a.Latitude, a.Longitude, a.Instructions,CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[Location] a
select r.GroupID, r.ActivityID, r.CredentialSetID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[ActivityCredentialSet] r
select r.ID, r.Name, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[Credential] r
select r.ID, r.GroupID,r.CredentialID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[CredentialSet] r
select r.ID, r.GroupName, r.ParentGroupId, r.GroupKey, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[Group] r

select r.GroupID, r.CredentialID, r.CredentialTypeID,r.Name, r.HowToAchieve, r.DisplayOrder, r.CredentialVerifiedByID, r.HowToAchieve_CTA_Destination, r.WhatIsThis, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupCredential] r
select r.GroupID, r.LocationID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupLocation] r

select r.GroupID, r.SupportActivityID, r.SupportActivityInstructionsID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupSupportActivityInstructions] r

select r.GroupID, r.NewRequestNotificationStrategyId, 
r.MaxVolunteer, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[NewRequestNotificationStrategy] r
select r.GroupID, r.AllowAutonomousJoinersAndLeavers,  CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[SecurityConfiguration] r
select r.SupportActivityInstructionsID, r.Instructions, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[SupportActivityInstructions] r

select r.GroupID, r.UserID, r.CredentialID, r.DateAdded, r.ValidUntil, r.AuthorisedByUserID, r.Reference, r.Notes,  CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[UserCredential] r
select r.UserID, r.RoleID, r.GroupId, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[UserRole] r

select r.Id, r.AuthorisedByUserID, r.UserID, r.GroupId, r.RoleId, r.DateRequested,r.ActionID,r.Success, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[UserRoleAudit] r
select r.GroupID, r.Source, r.RegistrationFormVariant, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Website].[RegistrationJourney] r
select r.GroupID, r.Source, r.RequestHelpFormVariant, r.TargetGroups,CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Website].[RequestHelpJourney] r
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[CredentialTypes] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[DueDateType] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[JobStatus] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[Location] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[NewRequestNotificationStrategy] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[Question] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[QuestionType] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RegistrationFormVariant] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestFormStage] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestFormVariant] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestHelpFormVariant] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestType] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[Role] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[SupportActivity] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[SupportActivityInstructions] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[TargetGroup] a
select r.JobID, r.GroupID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[JobAvailableToGroup] r
select r.RequestId,r.StartDate, r.ShiftLength, r.LocationId, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[Shift] r
select r.RequestId, r.ActivityID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[SupportActivities] r

sqlReaderQuery.value: select CT.ID, a.[PostcodeId], a.[AddressLine1],a.[AddressLine2], a.[AddressLine3],a.[Locality],a.[LastUpdated] , CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[AddressDetail] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Address].[AddressDetail], @{activity('Last_AddressDetail').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('CurrentChange_AddressDetail').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], a.[ShortName], a.[AddressLine1],a.[AddressLine2], a.[AddressLine3],a.[Locality],a.[PostCode],a.Latitude, a.Longitude, a.Instructions , CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[Location] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Address].[Location], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

source.query: SELECT top 1 c.MaxTS FROM c order by c._ts desc

query.value: SELECT top 1 c._ts FROM c where c._ts>@{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.MaxTS} order by c._ts desc

SELECT IS_DEFINED(c.RecipientUserID) ? c.RecipientUserID : c.RecipientUserId AS RecipientUserID, c.MessageId, c.GroupId, c.JobId, c.TemplateName,c.event,udf.convertTime(c._ts) as EventTime, IS_DEFINED(c.RequestId) ? c.RequestId : -1 as RequestId FROM c where c.TemplateName<>null and 
c.event<>null

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select CT.GroupID, CT.ActivityID, CT.CredentialSetID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION 
from [Group].[ActivityCredentialSet] r 
RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[ActivityCredentialSet], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID  and r.ActivityID = CT.ActivityID and r.CredentialSetID = CT.CredentialSetID
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, r.Name, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[Credential] 
r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[Credential], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT 
on r.ID = CT.ID 
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, CT.GroupID, CT.CredentialID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION 
from [Group].[CredentialSet] r 
RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[CredentialSet], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ID = CT.ID  and r.GroupID = CT.GroupID and r.CredentialID = CT.CredentialID
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, r.GroupName, r.ParentGroupId, r.GroupKey, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[Group] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[Group], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, CT.CredentialID, r.CredentialTypeID,r.Name, r.HowToAchieve, r.DisplayOrder, r.CredentialVerifiedByID, r.HowToAchieve_CTA_Destination, r.WhatIsThis,  CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupCredential] 
r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[GroupCredential], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT 
on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID and r.CredentialID = CT.CredentialID 
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, CT.LocationID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupLocation] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[GroupLocation], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID and r.LocationID = CT.LocationID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, CT.SupportActivityID,r.SupportActivityInstructionsID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupSupportActivityInstructions] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[GroupSupportActivityInstructions], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID and r.SupportActivityID = CT.SupportActivityID  where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, r.NewRequestNotificationStrategyId, r.MaxVolunteer, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[NewRequestNotificationStrategy] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[NewRequestNotificationStrategy], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, CT.Source, r.RequestHelpFormVariant, r.TargetGroups, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Website].[RequestHelpJourney] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Website].[RequestHelpJourney], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.Source = CT.Source and r.[GroupID] = CT.[GroupID] where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, r.AllowAutonomousJoinersAndLeavers, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION 
from [Group].[SecurityConfiguration] r 
RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[SecurityConfiguration], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.SupportActivityInstructionsID, r.Instructions, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[SupportActivityInstructions] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[SupportActivityInstructions], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.SupportActivityInstructionsID= CT.SupportActivityInstructionsID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, CT.UserID, CT.CredentialID, CT.DateAdded,r.ValidUntil, r.[AuthorisedByUserID], r.Reference, r.Notes , CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION 
from [Group].[UserCredential] r 
RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[UserCredential], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID  and r.UserID = CT.UserID and r.CredentialID = CT.CredentialID and r.DateAdded = CT.DateAdded
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.UserID, CT.RoleID, CT.GroupID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[UserRole] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[UserRole], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.UserID = CT.UserID and r.RoleID = CT.RoleID and r.GroupID = CT.GroupID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, r.AuthorisedByUserID, r.UserID,r.GroupID, r.RoleID, r.DateRequested,r.ActionID,r.Success , CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[UserRoleAudit] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[UserRoleAudit], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, CT.Source,r.[RegistrationFormVariant], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Website].[RegistrationJourney] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Website].[RegistrationJourney], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID and r.[Source] = CT.[Source] where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[CredentialTypes] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[CredentialTypes], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[DueDateType] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[DueDateType], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[JobStatus] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[JobStatus], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[Location] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[Location], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[NewRequestNotificationStrategy] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[NewRequestNotificationStrategy], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[Question] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[Question], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[QuestionType] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[QuestionType], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RegistrationFormVariant] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[RegistrationFormVariant], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestFormStage] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[RequestFormStage], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestFormVariant] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[RequestFormVariant], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestHelpFormVariant] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[RequestHelpFormVariant], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestType] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[RequestType], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[Role] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[Role], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[SupportActivity] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[SupportActivity], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[SupportActivityInstructions] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[SupportActivityInstructions], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[TargetGroup] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[TargetGroup], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, r.RequestId, r.SupportActivityID, r.Details, r.DueDate, r.IsHealthCritical, r.JobStatusID, r.VolunteerUserID , r.DueDateTypeId, r.Reference, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[Job] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[Job], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.JobID, CT.GroupID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[JobAvailableToGroup] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[JobAvailableToGroup], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.JobID = CT.JobID and r.GroupID = CT.GroupID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ActivityID, CT.QuestionID, CT.RequestFormVariantID, r.[Order], r.[Required], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [QuestionSet].[ActivityQuestions] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [QuestionSet].[ActivityQuestions], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ActivityID = CT.ActivityID and r.QuestionID = CT.QuestionID  and r.RequestFormVariantID = CT.RequestFormVariantID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, r.[Name],r.QuestionType,r.AdditionalData , CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [QuestionSet].[Question] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [QuestionSet].[Question], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ID = CT.ID  where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, r.PostCode, r.DateRequested, r.IsFulfillable,r.CommunicationSent,r.ForRequestor,r.OtherDetails,r.PersonID_Recipient,r.PersonID_Requester,r.ReadPrivacyNotice,r.AcceptedTerms,r.SpecialCommunicationNeeds,r.CreatedByUserID, r.RequestorType, r.OrganisationName, r.Archive, r.[Guid], r.ReferringGroupId, r.RequestorDefinedByGroup, r.RequestType, r.Source, r.FulfillableStatus, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[Request] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[Request], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.requestId, r.ActivityID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[SupportActivities] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[SupportActivities], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.RequestID = CT.RequestID and r.ActivityID = CT.ActivityID 
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, u.FirebaseUID, u.PostalCode, u.EmailSharingConsent, u.MobileSharingConsent, u.OtherPhoneSharingConsent, u.HMSContactConsent, u.IsVolunteer, u.IsVerified, u.DateCreated, u.StreetChampionRoleUnderstood, u.SupportVolunteersByPhone, u.SupportRadiusMiles, u.ReferringGroupId,u.Source, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[User] u RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [User].[User], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on u.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

source.query: SELECT top 1 c.MaxTS FROM c order by c._ts desc

query.value:
SELECT c.datestamp, c.userId, c.rememberMeId, c.verified, c.verificationDetails.dobMatch, c.verificationDetails.ageMatch, c.verificationDetails.notPreviouslyVerified,c.userUpdated 
from c where c._ts>@{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.MaxTS}
SELECT top 1 c._ts FROM c where c._ts>@{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.MaxTS} order by c._ts desc

SELECT c.datestamp, c.userId, c.rememberMeId, c.verified, c.verificationDetails.dobMatch, c.verificationDetails.ageMatch, c.verificationDetails.notPreviouslyVerified,c.userUpdated 
from c 
where c._ts>1589372085
